product_name: The North Face Valence Fleece Jacket - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Discover warmth without bulk with the men's breathable Valence Fleece Jacket from The North Face. Stretch panels free up your reach, and the high-loft fleece backing is unbelievably soft. Polyester fleece has a heathered face; the raschel backing is so luxurious you won't want to take this jacket off. FlashDry(TM) stretch panels at the neck, down the sides and under the arms stretch, breathe, transfer perspiration to the surface and dry fast. Drawcord hem and stretch cuffs seal in warmth. The North Face Valence Fleece Jacket for men has zip hand pockets. Closeout.
short_description: Discover warmth without bulk with the men's breathable Valence Fleece Jacket from The North Face. Stretch panels free up your reach, and the high-loft fleece backing is unbelievably soft.
